name: Greek Salad
description: A refreshing salad with crisp lettuce, juicy tomatoes, cucumbers, olives, onions, and feta cheese, tossed in a tangy Greek dressing.

name: Caesar Salad
description: Classic Caesar salad featuring romaine lettuce, garlic croutons, Parmesan cheese, and a creamy Caesar dressing, garnished with anchovies (optional).

name: Cobb Salad
description: A hearty salad made with mixed greens, grilled chicken breast, crispy bacon, hard-boiled eggs, avocado, tomatoes, and blue cheese, served with your choice of dressing.

name: Caprese Salad
description: A simple yet elegant salad featuring fresh tomatoes, mozzarella cheese, basil leaves, drizzled with extra virgin olive oil and balsamic glaze, seasoned with salt and pepper.

name: Sushi Rolls
description: Delicious sushi rolls filled with a variety of ingredients such as fresh fish, avocado, cucumber, and rice, served with soy sauce and wasabi.

name: Spring Rolls
description: Crispy and light spring rolls filled with vegetables and sometimes meat, served with a sweet and sour dipping sauce.

name: Egg Rolls
description: Fried egg rolls filled with a savory mixture of chopped vegetables and meat, typically served with plum sauce or sweet chili sauce.

name: California Rolls
description: Popular sushi rolls made with imitation crab meat, avocado, and cucumber, wrapped in seaweed and sushi rice, served with pickled ginger and wasabi.

name: Chocolate Cake
description: Decadent chocolate cake with layers of moist chocolate sponge and rich chocolate ganache, topped with chocolate shavings.

name: Cheesecake
description: Creamy and smooth cheesecake on a buttery graham cracker crust, topped with your choice of fruit compote or chocolate sauce.

name: Tiramisu
description: Classic Italian dessert made with layers of coffee-soaked ladyfingers, mascarpone cheese, and cocoa powder, creating a rich and creamy indulgence.

name: Fruit Tart
description: Buttery tart shell filled with pastry cream and topped with an assortment of fresh fruit, glazed with apricot jam for a shiny finish.

name: Club Sandwich
description: Classic triple-decker sandwich filled with layers of roasted turkey, crispy bacon, lettuce, tomato, and mayonnaise, served with a side of fries.

name: BLT Sandwich
description: Simple yet satisfying sandwich with crispy bacon, fresh lettuce, and juicy tomato slices, served on toasted bread with mayonnaise.

name: Grilled Cheese Sandwich
description: Comforting grilled sandwich with melted cheese between slices of buttered bread, toasted until golden brown and crispy.

name: Vegetarian Sandwich
description: Healthy and delicious sandwich filled with a variety of fresh vegetables, such as lettuce, tomato, cucumber, avocado, and bell peppers, served on whole wheat bread.

name: Red Velvet Cake
description: Classic red velvet cake with layers of moist red cocoa sponge and creamy cream cheese frosting, decorated with red velvet crumbs.

name: Carrot Cake
description: Moist carrot cake made with grated carrots, warm spices, and chopped nuts, topped with smooth cream cheese frosting and a sprinkle of cinnamon.

name: Black Forest Cake
description: Decadent chocolate cake layered with whipped cream and cherries, topped with chocolate shavings and more cherries, creating a delightful combination of flavors.

name: Lemon Cake
description: Zesty lemon cake with a tangy lemon glaze, made with fresh lemon zest and juice for a bright and refreshing dessert.

name: Vegetable Stir-Fry
description: A delicious medley of fresh vegetables stir-fried to perfection in a savory sauce, served over steamed rice or noodles.

name: Vegetable Curry
description: Hearty and comforting vegetable curry made with a variety of seasonal vegetables simmered in a fragrant blend of spices and coconut milk, served with rice or bread.

name: Grilled Vegetable Platter
description: A colorful assortment of grilled vegetables such as bell peppers, zucchini, eggplant, and mushrooms, seasoned with herbs and olive oil, served with a side of dipping sauce.

name: Vegetable Biryani
description: Fragrant and flavorful biryani made with basmati rice, mixed vegetables, and aromatic spices, garnished with fried onions and fresh herbs, served with raita.

name: Spaghetti Carbonara
description: Classic Italian pasta dish made with spaghetti tossed in a creamy sauce of eggs, Parmesan cheese, pancetta or bacon, and black pepper, creating a rich and indulgent meal.

name: Penne Arrabbiata
description: Spicy and flavorful penne pasta served in a fiery tomato sauce infused with garlic, red chili flakes, and fresh basil, topped with grated Parmesan cheese.

name: Fettuccine Alfredo
description: Rich and creamy fettuccine pasta tossed in a decadent Alfredo sauce made with butter, cream, and Parmesan cheese, seasoned with salt, pepper, and nutmeg.

name: Vegetable Lasagna
description: Layers of lasagna noodles, marinara sauce, saut√©ed vegetables, and creamy ricotta cheese, baked until bubbly and golden brown, creating a satisfying and comforting dish.

name: Chow Mein
description: Stir-fried noodles tossed with a variety of vegetables and protein such as chicken, beef, or tofu, in a savory soy sauce-based sauce, creating a flavorful and satisfying dish.

name: Pad Thai
description: A popular Thai dish consisting of stir-fried rice noodles with eggs, tofu, shrimp, bean sprouts, and peanuts, flavored with tamarind sauce and garnished with lime wedges.

name: Soba Noodle Salad
description: Refreshing salad made with cold soba noodles, mixed greens, shredded vegetables, and a tangy sesame dressing, garnished with toasted sesame seeds and sliced green onions.

name: Ramen Soup
description: Japanese noodle soup made with wheat noodles, savory broth, slices of roasted pork, soft-boiled eggs, bamboo shoots, seaweed, and green onions, creating a comforting and satisfying meal.
